mapper.select: SELECT A.*, DECODE(B.THUMBSCNT, NULL, 0, B.THUMBSCNT) AS thumbsCnt, DECODE(C.COMMENTCNT, NULL, 0, C.COMMENTCNT) AS commentCnt FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, BOARD_CODE_SEQ as boardCodeSeq, USER_ID userId, BOARD_TITLE boardTitle, BOARD_CONTENT boardContent, BOARD_TYPE boardType, BOARD_DATE boardDate, BOARD_COUNT boardCount FROM BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_CODE_SEQ DESC )A, (SELECT BOARD_CODE_SEQ, COUNT(*) AS THUMBSCNT FROM BOARD_THUMB GROUP BY BOARD_CODE_SEQ) B, (SELECT BOARD_CODE_SEQ, COUNT(*) AS COMMENTCNT FROM BOARD_COMMENT GROUP BY BOARD_CODE_SEQ) C WHERE A.boardCodeSeq = B.BOARD_CODE_SEQ(+) AND A.boardCodeSeq = C.BOARD_CODE_SEQ(+) AND RNUM > #{startPage} AND RNUM <= #{endPage} ORDER BY A.boardCodeSeq DESC

SELECT ROWNUM, D.* FROM (SELECT A.*, DECODE(B.thumbCnt, null, 0, B.thumbCnt) AS thumbsCnt, DECODE(C.commentCnt, NULL, 0, C.commentCnt) AS commentCnt FROM (SELECT BOARD_CODE_SEQ as boardCodeSeq, USER_ID userId, BOARD_TITLE boardTitle, BOARD_CONTENT boardContent, BOARD_TYPE boardType, BOARD_DATE boardDate, BOARD_COUNT boardCount FROM BOARD )A, (SELECT BOARD_CODE_SEQ, COUNT(*) AS THUMBCNT FROM BOARD_THUMB GROUP BY BOARD_CODE_SEQ ) B, (SELECT BOARD_CODE_SEQ, COUNT(*) AS COMMENTCNT FROM BOARD_COMMENT GROUP BY BOARD_CODE_SEQ) C WHERE A.boardCodeSeq = B.BOARD_CODE_SEQ(+) AND A.boardCodeSeq = C.BOARD_CODE_SEQ(+) ORDER BY thumbsCnt DESC) D WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT A.*, DECODE(B.THUMBSCNT, NULL, 0, B.THUMBSCNT) AS thumbsCnt, DECODE(C.COMMENTCNT, NULL, 0, C.COMMENTCNT) AS commentCnt FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, BOARD_CODE_SEQ as boardCodeSeq, USER_ID userId, BOARD_TITLE boardTitle, BOARD_CONTENT boardContent, BOARD_TYPE boardType, BOARD_DATE boardDate, BOARD_COUNT boardCount FROM BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_CODE_SEQ DESC )A, (SELECT BOARD_CODE_SEQ, COUNT(*) AS THUMBSCNT FROM BOARD_THUMB GROUP BY BOARD_CODE_SEQ) B, (SELECT BOARD_CODE_SEQ, COUNT(*) AS COMMENTCNT FROM BOARD_COMMENT GROUP BY BOARD_CODE_SEQ) C WHERE A.boardCodeSeq = B.BOARD_CODE_SEQ(+) AND A.boardCodeSeq = C.BOARD_CODE_SEQ(+)
AND A.boardTitle like '%'||#{boardContent}||'%'
AND A.userId like '%'||#{boardContent}||'%'
ORDER BY A.boardCodeSeq DESC
